name: How to make a victorian garden swing photo photography prop
description:
Think of the wonderful setting you can create with your very own Victorian-Inspired
garden swing in your photography studio (or outdoors) for children's photo shoots!


The latest & greatest instructional pattern from Goosie Girl has arrived!

This ebook/tutorial is a PDF download. After your purchase, and payment is received, you will receive this digital file via email provided. Please note: you will NOT receive a hard copy of these instructions via snail mail. This is an electronic PDF file pattern.

Delivery: I generally send ebooks within a few hours, but please allow 24-48 hours for your pdf to be sent. You will then download it to your computer ~ and in turn you will enjoy Goosie Girl's awesome instructions with color photographs of each and every step, a supply list, and lots of great tips for makng your swing just the cutest it can be!

The cost for this tutorial will be an introductory price of $10, a great investment for adding a fab prop to your stash (these swings would also be DARLING in a child's room, or on a covered/enclosed porch for decoration!)

You will need a few tools such as a power drill w/a 7/8" paddle/spade bit and a few other general craft supplies.

name: How to make a hydrangea petal baby hat infant photo prop NO SEW
description:
Learn how to make Goosie Girl's Hydrangea Petal Hats
After much debate, internal struggle and talking it over with fellow designers...

I've decided to write a tutorial on how to make my hydrangea petal hats!


The 1st part of the tutorial covers how to make a kufi hat (minor hand sewing required), however you can purchase kufi hats already made if you don't want to sew the hats yourself. Then the 2nd part of the tutorial shows instructions/tips/techniques on how I make my hats.
This tutorial includes a complete materials/supply list, a photo and written instructions of each and every step as well as a list of where I buy my supplies. 

These no-sew hats are super cute and ideal for photography props, tons have already been sold! They fit newborns through about 6 month old babies...and they are to die for adorable!

name: How to make Raggie Bows Ebook PDF Tutorial NO SEWING
description:
So many people have tried to figure out how I make my bows, and how to duplicate them, with much confusion and frustration...Now...I am *finally* sharings my secrets on how to make "Raggie Bows ï¿½ "!!



Included in this Ebook are clear, concise instructions with many, many pictures and a diagram drawn out to help you learn the techniques and tips to make these unique fabric bows. If you want to know the *RIGHT* way to make my bows, this ebook will teach you exactly how to do it, and with beautiful results!

Just think of all the beautiful bows you can make, with PERFECTLY matching fabric to match her handmade dresses and sets! A bow for every day! A bow in her school colors to show her school spirit at pep assemblies, spirit day and sporting events! Made to match your favorite lines from Gynboree, hanna, or JacknJanie and beyond!



In addition to step-by-step instructions, also included are the names of suppliers I use & recommend, tips on selecting fabrics and how to add embellishments. I've also included some information on how to make a Raggie Bow on a Headband as well as How to Make "piggie" or "pigtail" bows. Throughout the ebook, I not only tell you HOW but I also include many *WHYS* as to the reason I do things the way I do, many years of trial and error have shown me the best way to perfect this original bow of mine. These bows require NO sewing!!



The ebook will arrive in PDF format via email, you will *not* receive any instructions or files, or bows in the mail!

*****This is a digital transaction, please be aware of what you are purchasing prior to buying this ebook.*****

Please allow 24-48 hours for delivery of your pdf file via email.

**Note: All sales are final on ebooks, no refunds whatsoever.** It is your choice to buy this book, and it will not be refunded once it is sent to you.*
